questions.subject: quantitative-aptitude
questions.explanation: 25 × 4 = 100. This is a basic multiplication problem.

questions.questionEn: Which of the following is a prime number?
questions.questionHi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सी अभाज्य संख्या है?
questions.subject: quantitative-aptitude
questions.explanation: 17 is a prime number because it has only two factors: 1 and 17.
